Nompumelelo Ngoma (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ. Ọrụ ya dị ná nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè Smithsonian's National Museum of African Art.
N'afọ 2016, ọ natara ònyìnyé Cassirer Welz
A mụrụ Ngoma nà Soweto, Jabulani nà South Africa.
Ngoma gárá South West Gauteng College ébé ọ gụrụ Fine Art
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ atọ na Artist Proof Studio ma nweta nzèrè Honours nà Visual Art nà Mahadum Johannesburg nà 2012.

Monoprint ya, Take Care of Me, bụ nkè National Museum of African Art zụrụ na 2014 mà gosipụta ya na ihe ngosi nka I Am...Ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe n'oge a n'Africa. Ihe ngosi mbụ nke Ngoma bụ THULA MFAZI! na Circa Johannesburg na 2017. N'afọ 2021, a gụnyere ọrụ Ngoma na North-West University (NWU) Gallery's online exhibit: Mantariana Mbokodo Musings lekwasịrị ányá na ụmụ nwanyị ise na-ese ihe na South Africa.
Ngoma bị mà ná arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg.
